mainText:
Dear God,

If there is heaven, or paradise, please get this great man there, and allow
him the noblest suite. Give him a simple job and does not require much, but
leave it free to create, no doubt he will contribute greatly to cool ideas
to improve the world and help you revolutionize and implement. Know that
here on earth he changed history.

Steve go with God, your family stay comfortable and at peace.
author: Marcelo
